title: WHAT IS A WALLET?
body:
WHAT IS A WALLET?

Don’t look for a digital wallet in your pants pocket or purse. The wallet we’re talking about here is what you’ll need to financially transact in the blockchain world, manage your collection of cryptocurrencies, store your NFT tokens, and interact with decentralized apps. Your wallet and its contents are secured by a “private key” (password), a wholly-unique-to-you recovery phrase or series of words that allow just you and you alone to access your wallet.  Should you wish to transact to/from your wallet, you’ll also have a “public key” that serves as its digital address that allows you to send currency or stored assets to someone else, and vice versa. Wallets come in two flavors: “hot” and “cold”. Hot wallets are stored online which provides ease and immediacy in using them, but as with anything online, security vulnerabilities may occur that could pose severe, perhaps catastrophic risk to your wallet’s holdings. Cold wallets also use private and public keys, but these wallets are kept offline, say, on paper or in a secondary drive designed for that purpose, and thus cannot be exposed to online vulnerability (but cold wallets are still vulnerable should you allow a bad actor to learn your private key).

There’s no Velcro strip or dainty zipper securing your digital wallet; it’s your private key alone that keep its contents safe…as long as you NEVER share your private key with anyone!

title: Games and blockchain
body:
Preface: Usually, for my blog posts, I just write stream-of-consciousness rambles, and don’t even bother proofreading. This is different - this is the first time I actually put in some effort. Why? To celebrate Mirror launching Writing NFTs on Optimism. I have no idea why anyone would buy NFTs for this post, but if you do: 100% of the proceeds will be directed straight to the Gitcoin multi-sig for public goods funding. I’d love to hear feedback - should I repeat this for my older posts, and future posts?

Blockchains have found their niche as a store-of-value, in DeFi applications, speculation ([kwonzis](https://twitter.com/epolynya/status/1528055349730680834)?) and NFTs. Certain identity & reputation protocols like ENS are gathering steam too. Everyone’s asking - what’s next? Many are convinced its gaming. In this post, I’ll argue why blockchain gaming isn’t what many crypto people think; but also, how it can find an interesting niche.

**Games are diverse**

Before we begin, there are all sorts of games which couldn’t be more different from one another. Likewise, different gamers have different preferences. It’s impossible to write a post and cover all areas. So, when I talk about “games” and “gamers”, I’ll take a broad view.

**Why we play games**

In said broad view, I define games as a form of entertainment. Most gamers play games to entertain themselves, challenge themselves, in one way or another.

A [great quote from Todd Howard](https://www.theguardian.com/games/2020/nov/30/todd-howard-bethesda-starfield-future-games-interview) that captures the spirit of games:

> That’s one of the things people who don’t play a lot of games never quite understand. When you play a game and you accomplish something, that’s real. It’s a real accomplishment in your life, or it has been to me, and to other people I meet who love gaming. You can finish the week and say, ‘I saved the world’, and you legit feel that way. That’s the magic.

In almost all cases, it’s an escape from the hardest game of all - real life.

**Money is the antidote to fun**

Arguably, the most toxic element of real life is money. Picture this - you’re having a ton of fun in a game, and you need to acquire an item that’ll give you some abilities to - you guessed it - have more fun. Sure, the game world has its own rules with their own consequences, but you can be sure a mistake will never cost you irl. This liberating feeling is essential to gaming.

Now - if you add real money to the picture… I need say no more. There’s nothing that’ll suck away immersion in a more soul-crushingly debilitating manner than financializing games. It is critical that the game world’s economics and mechanics have a hard separation from the real world.

**Play-to-earn is unsustainable, pay-to-win is loathed**

By now, it should be clear that inflationary mechanisms like play-to-earn are economically unsustainable. Some would argue they’ll “find an equilibrium”, but in reality, it’s just a matter of time - there are a limited number of greater fools. Play-to-win systems are an improvement because it *could* be economically sustainable, but it’s also no fun. See: separation of game world and real world, as mentioned above. Pay-to-win already exists in gaming - in the form of microtransactions - and it’s safe to say they are heavily loathed by core gamers, as proven by the [Star Wars: Battlefront 2 debacle](https://www.theverge.com/2018/4/13/17230874/ea-star-wars-battlefront-2-loot-box-patrick-soderlund-interview). Since then, the games industry has done a sharp U-turn away from play-to-win mechanics, for very good reason. At most, there are cosmetic microtransactions, which have no impact on gameplay. Indeed, EA’s follow-up to Battlefront 2, Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, had no microtransactions of any kind, and turned out to be EA’s most commercially successful non-FIFA game in recent years. People paid money to play the game, and that’s it.

All that said, financial mechanics will always exist in some form, and they are normalized in some forms of gaming, particularly in the mobile space. You can also have purely financial games, more akin to gambling or trading - and blockchains have three key advantages: borderless, regulation-circumventing, and most importantly, DeFi composability. But this is not what I think of as “gaming” - call it “GameFi” if you will.

**Cross-game asset sharing and interoperability is hard - needs new infrastructure**

Another common idea is that game assets from one game can transfer to another, and continue to function if a game shuts down. While a nice idea, in reality game assets from one game are not compatible with each other. You have to get developers of two different games to agree to the same standard. Besides, assets are of no use if the game shuts down anyway. Yet, common infrastructure that many games can use does have potential.

So, to enable these types of use cases in a decentralized manner, we need to build extremely complex infrastructure, a lot of it from the ground up. This is an incredibly challenging task, which may take several Lubins (note, 1 Lubin = 1,136 days or \~3.1 years) to build. The brave folks at [Topology](https://topology.gg/) are taking on this very ambitious challenge.

Someone like Epic Games is better placed to accomplish this, by adding these features to Epic Online Services & Unreal Engine, and creating a standard SDK which different games can use. However, right now, there isn’t any demand for cross-game interoperability, so it’s a low priority. It’s much harder to accomplish this in a decentralized manner.

**Decentralized gaming infrastructure is more than blockchains**

Let’s assume that the decentralized gaming infrastructure above happens - a big assumption, as noted above. Putting it “on blockchain” is simply impossible. Games require several orders of magnitude greater compute & storage than the fastest blockchains will ever provide. For example, most “crypto games” currently are totally centralized, and just put NFTs on-chain.

The wider decentralized gaming infrastructure will need peer-to-peer game clients (run by the players), decentralized storage layers, dedicated execution layers etc.

Zero-knowledge proofs (& related tech like MPCs/NMCs) will play a key role. The idea that you can have massive computations but only need to verify a succinct proof changes the game. The infrastructure will need to be modularized. For example, certain things can be computed transparently at the game client end, certain things can use traditional anti-cheat, certain things may require the game clients to generate zero-knowledge proofs, storage may be on things like Filecoin/IPFS, while others may need consensus on specialized execution layers, i.e. application-specific recursive rollups/volitions or L3s, and composability & interoperability mechanisms between them. In the end, the blockchain part - the L3s - may only be used for very specific purposes. State channels on top of L3s also show promise for certain types of multiplayer games. Of course, certain financial games can still use smart-contract chains (L1s or L2s) for high-value assets but I expect these to be a niche - albeit a highly valuable one - going forward.

My general recommendation to whoever is building these is to ask yourself - how would Epic Online Services build this? And then progressively decentralize. Also, don’t bother building the entire gaming stack - just the bits that are unique and valuable to distributed gaming, with the ability to plug in to existing gaming engines and middleware.

**Game development studios as DAOs?**

Developing games is a creative endeavour. As Francis Ford Coppola put it, “filmmaking is the last dictatorial medium”. Games are no different - it’s very important for the game to have a coherent, creative voice, so bazaar-style development simply does not work. A well-ordered structure with creative directors and department leads is essential to producing a high-quality game. Indeed, some studios like Valve have tried a mild variant of this - [and failed](https://medium.com/dunia-media/the-nightmare-of-valves-self-organizing-utopia-6d32d329ecdb). Smaller indie developers work differently, but they also have no need for DAOs. A more promising avenue is using blockchain platforms for fundraising - there’s potential here to do better than Kickstarter.

(As a side-note: crypto people vastly underestimate how difficult making a game is. I have seen roadmaps which claim to make “AAA games in 6 months” or general statements like “hundreds of AAA crypto games in development”. This is simply not how it works. The average AAA game costs $100 million, requires >100 people and 3 years to develop. Oh, did I mention that most game developers dislike crypto games? The talent is simply not available to make so many high-quality AAA games as you may have been led to believe. Sure, indie games can be made for much less, but crypto people have a bad habit of overhyping “AAA crypto games”.)

Nevertheless, there are some types of games that can genuinely be better as DAOs - online game platforms with creative communities. Roblox is an example that’d be better decentralized, with better commissions and rights for creators. Indeed, [Briq](https://briq.construction/) is building this.

Another possibility is evolving multiplayer games. Once the game is developed, it can be open-sourced. Players who buy the game can propose and vote on changes to the protocol. In reality, though, it’s impossible to satisfy everyone’s needs, and game developers are very well incentivized to do their best. By and large, game developers of these types of games are very pragmatic, and all of them listen closely to community feedback. The ability to fork away can be interesting, though, so I’d definitely like to see this pursued.

**Game distribution**

Decentralizing game distribution is another legitimate usecase. Unfortunately, it is extremely difficult for a new game distribution service to gain adoption in 2022. Epic Games Store has burned through hundreds of millions (if not billions) of dollars, yet they remain a distant second to Steam. Others like GOG, Itch, Microsoft Store are relegated to small niches. So, really, decentralization is best achieved in the form of private sector players competing fiercely, than a decentralized platform that lacks focus and resources. Still, this could form a niche - I can see it being popular for retro games, or perhaps for trading cards only.

**Novel mechanics using smart contracts**

So far, basically, the conclusion is blockchain has no place in a vast majority of games, but they can be used to enhance certain aspects, in specific cases.

Things get interesting when you consider novel mechanics that can only be accomplished by smart contracts. Dark Forest is a great early example. Imagine: an artificially intelligent agent that can write and design stories, puzzles, mechanics, worlds etc in a digital world. Using zero-knowledge cryptography, no one knows the solution. Yet, people from around the world can cooperate and coordinate to solve these. Granted, we are Lubins away from something complex like this, but it shows there’s potential for emergent gameplay that’s only possible with blockchain tech.

It is imperative for actually novel games like this to avoid financialization. It can simply be a game that people pay for, to be entertained. What a concept! Some element of tokenization and rewards can help certain types of games, but we must be very, very cautious against making these tradeable.

**Concluding**

In general, most of “crypto gaming” today and in the near future is nonsense and is justifiably despised by the wider gaming community. Most games do not need blockchain tech - indeed, it will be detrimental to most types of games.

However, we can do better and form niches with novel paradigms. I’d recommend keeping a close eye out for the StarkNet gaming community - this is where real innovation is being attempted.

body:
我们在建设一个村子，位于浙江·太湖南部，靠近上海和杭州。村子有很多古宅，白墙黛瓦，清民风范，保留这样的气质，设计成古风文旅会有很好的沉浸体验，应邀的来访者都有好感。这坚定了我们要精心设计内容的决心。

内容建设和基建不同，集思广益，需要UGC，因此我们希望通过Web3协作共同展开叙事…

![正射影像](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iSVa4Hg7CGGsrvw3oH-VL.jpg?height=500&width=1500)

150户古宅（宅基地）可以改造成商业集群运营20年。民宿、酒肆、茶馆、画廊、曲苑…清明上河繁荣，元宇宙实境。

![古法新酿](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FT7d9xqakTqvVkBV9ExE_.jpg?height=692&width=1440)

古村2020年获得“美丽乡村”立项，桥梁、村道、植被、景观等基础环境改造已经启动。目前基础建设是以公司的组织形式开展的，具体情况会在后面新启篇幅以及AMA中解答。

![环境改造](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/O2cKza-N4ohf-o_DCSOiR.jpg?height=300&width=1500)

我们希望代入Web3机制的是“内容叙事”和“运营方式”，这两方面分别定义成“Storyliving”和“Time Bank”。

Storyliving一词来自于迪士尼在加州·奥兰多开发的商业地产项目。当全世界都在围绕Meta建设虚拟场景元宇宙的时候，地球上最会讲故事的公司--迪士尼表示，元宇宙应该是肉身住在童话小镇里，思绪荡漾在故事里。我们也认为，沉浸式的文旅小镇能够带给居住者丰富的生命体验，是贯穿于虚实的元宇宙平台。

title: Introducing Writing NFTs
body:
Before Ethereum was code, it was a piece of writing. A year prior to Ethereum’s launch in 2015, Vitalik Buterin published a [whitepaper](https://ethereum.org/669c9e2e2027310b6b3cdce6e1c52962/Ethereum_Whitepaper_-_Buterin_2014.pdf) that laid out his vision for the project. Like Satoshi before him, Vitalik’s whitepaper served as a call to action that inspired a group of believers to help bring his ideas to fruition. This whitepaper has become an invaluable artifact — a foundational text with historical significance.

Over the last year, Mirror has built a space for web3 ideas to grow. Thousands of writers – including [DAO operators](https://creators.mirror.xyz/5YUK1Ef3BEMA9QEZvbOIh7ukbjAYL_0cs_NLplqgHw4), [NFT projects](https://cryptocoven.mirror.xyz/A622VSRm8-9oLzc8l3oFGmfnFUZQmDQ3Wx3ObhSlhsc), [engineers](https://polynya.mirror.xyz/OScOYZJj82107SAuSC0p0AofVesBbje6IT8NymBVi1g), [investors](https://variant.mirror.xyz/WwHDcojWvXU8mwYbcsvnN1kx6uLS4wV6fuS-ghkw3X4) and [protocol teams](https://optimism.mirror.xyz/gQWKlrDqHzdKPsB1iUnI-cVN3v0NvsWnazK7ajlt1fI) – have used Mirror to introduce their best ideas to the ecosystem. Their voices have made it a vibrant destination for web3 writing.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vjPMlew7k5rtD-oaWIjMg.png?height=1344&width=2688&&&&size=medium)

## At Mirror, we believe the next big idea will be collected as a Writing NFT.

**Starting today, you can:**

* Create your first Writing NFT from your [Dashboard](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard)
* Collect from a list of genesis entries [curated by Mirror DAO](https://dao.mirror.xyz/collection)
* Explore the top entries on the new [leaderboard](https://mirror.xyz/leaderboard)

Many of the ideas published on Mirror have become invaluable to their communities — just like Vitalik’s whitepaper. Starting today, we are empowering people to collect the most important writing they find on Mirror — to publicly signal support for those ideas and to find belonging in like-minded collector communities.

Mirror now allows you to mint your writing as a digital collectible and set a customizable supply and price for it. Writing NFTs are completely free for writers to create, and collection happens on an Ethereum L2 — making transactions inexpensive, fast, and environmentally friendly. And, like everything published on Mirror, Writing NFTs are decentralized and censorship-resistant.

For collectors, owning a Writing NFT confers a stake in the piece’s legacy and a place within the community that develops around it. Did someone announce a project that you want to see brought to life? Did a trend forecast spark your imagination or validate your own intuition? Is someone embarking on a research project that resonated with you?

Adding a Writing NFT to your collection is a way of capturing these special moments and rallying behind the potential of an idea. Imagine, for instance, having proof that you were one of the first 100 people to read the Ethereum whitepaper. It not only signals that you were an early adopter or superfan, but it also binds you with other collectors of that Writing NFT.

Many writers from our community have minted their first Writing NFT as part of today’s launch. For example, [Chase Chapman](https://twitter.com/chaserchapman) minted [Co-ownership as a web3 social primitive](https://chase.mirror.xyz/PjnfkklAMUcEIBQuZ-An5xlBheQchsLwkRx6GHPfGzw?wnft=true) with a supply of 333 at 0.01 ETH each. If you have an Ethereum wallet, you can collect it right now. Once the supply is sold out on Mirror, collectors will be able to purchase Writing NFTs on secondary markets.

To complement the launch of Writing NFTs, we want to do all we can to boost great ideas. Over the past year, one of the most frequent requests from both writers and readers has been to improve the discovery of high-quality content published on Mirror. Today, we’re adding two new discovery surfaces: the global [leaderboard](https://mirror.xyz/leaderboard) and [collector profile pages](https://dao.mirror.xyz/collection). You can use these to find and explore all of the Writing NFTs launching today.

The leaderboard will rank the most popular entries based on the amount of ETH raised and the number of collectors, exposing more writers – and their most resonant ideas – to a wider audience.

Collector profile pages allow community members to display the Writing NFTs they’ve curated on Mirror. It’s where readers might go to find new writing from trusted sources — the equivalent of perusing an esteemed friend’s bookshelf. In turn, they can build their own reputation as a collector.

But don’t just collect; create! Whether you’ve been sitting on a groundbreaking new whitepaper or you simply want to test out writing on Mirror, you can create your first Writing NFT today. All you have to do is [connect your wallet](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard) and you’re ready to post, price, and mint your work.

If you want to own a part of Mirror history, you can collect this announcement as a Writing NFT below.


---

Now go [create](https://mirror.xyz/dashboard), [collect](https://dao.mirror.xyz/collection) and [explore](https://mirror.xyz/leaderboard) the best writing in web3. Follow [@viamirror](https://twitter.com/viamirror) for more updates!

title: Buidling Innovation & Vibes! Metis at Permissionless ‘22
body:
Last week, Permissionless brought a new energy to Palm Beach. The web3 community took the city by storm through innovation, building, and many good vibes. Web3 social summer truly kicked off with all our favorite projects, builders and frens, featuring many focused and fun events, and even the surprise launch of Lens Protocol! In light of shocking news and even a bearish market, changemakers showed up at Permissionless to remind us all that the drive and spirit of web3 innovation is still very much alive!

![Metis cocktail anyone?](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/jnR35nHp38KmYtha6ZIgV.JPG?height=1000&width=1500)

***Our favorite night!***

***Leave No Trace by Boys Club sponsored by Metis, Visa, and Flow Carbon***

Metis undoubtedly made a splash as cosponsors and co-hosts of [Boys Club](https://twitter.com/BoysClubCrypto?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor)’s Leave No Trace party with Visa and Flowcarbon! The event sold out with a mile long waiting list, and true to the Boys Club mission, we saw the most diverse representation of the entire conference. Compared to typical web3 parties/ events with seas of men and few women, our event represented a very inclusive crowd of change-makers in web3. A strong turn out of both women and men showed up in their best outfits and highly coveted web3 swag to celebrate the week with fellow innovators in the space.

![Metis Team](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aLGnhnbeYpzEHu3zajHW3.JPG?height=1000&width=1500)

*Ft. [Metis team members](https://www.metis.io/company/) Ashley Spradlin, Andy Proffitt, Chelsea Kubo, Matt Gunn & Pavel Sinelnikov*

Guests arrived at The Colony Hotel for a garden party with DJ and drinks. A pastel and patterned ballroom offered an oasis from the humidity outside, but with a cool drink in hand, the palm tree bordered patio was the place to be. A Boys Club backdrop set the stage for photos between networking chats and refreshers of Metis’ themed cocktail, “It’s called scaling.” Climate conversations generated by [Flow Carbon](https://www.flowcarbon.com/homepage)’s efforts to offset carbon emissions and invest in environmental protection projects wove together with ways to get more Web2 companies, like VISA, integrated with Web3.

![Swagged out](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lwknOhmYJJi8pVVQo31hA.JPG?height=1000&width=1500)

![Permissionless showing up!](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/I_Gh0vUYvlLwblqdCs1NS.JPG?height=1000&width=1500)

Inside, the dance floor was buzzing, and we were all taken back to grade school with temporary tattoos on every table. We sported heart shaped odes to Vitalik or Metis girls on our biceps as we chatted with developers and innovators about what this summer has in store for Web3 and how we can support more women in the space. With two powerhouse women at the helm of Metis, we were excited to be in good company.

![Proof of Dance!](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2jobdeTAuRol3bD7DheKS.JPG?height=1000&width=1500)

All in all, we’d describe the energy of Permissionless as focused, innovative and spirited. The market truly doesn’t stop the building or fun in web3. Projects and community turned up to build an even more decentralized and empowered industry, and the vibes were high as people collaborated over innovation this season.

We’re so glad to have partnered with Boys Club and looking forward to building with the web3 community and hosting our next Metis Fest during Consensus in Austin next month! Follow [MetisFest](https://twitter.com/MetisFest) on Twitter to get all the details on our upcoming events.

title: เหตุใดเราจึงต้องการโซเชียลกราฟแบบกระจายศูนย์?
body:
เมื่อเราลงทะเบียนบนแพลตฟอร์มโซเชียลมีเดียเป็นครั้งแรกนั้น มันแทบเหมือนจะเป็นสัญชาตญานไปแล้วที่จะต้องติดตามรายชื่อดาราที่แนะนำ หัวข้อที่คุณสนใจ และซิงค์รายชื่อติดต่อในโทรศัพท์หรือ Facebook สำหรับเพื่อนที่คุณอาจรู้จัก เราใช้คำแนะนำอัลกอริธึมเหล่านี้เสมือนเป็นสิ่งไม่มีค่าซะจนเราละเลยคำถามที่ว่า รายการพวกนี้สร้างขึ้นมาได้อย่างไร?

และแน่นอน เราตกลงที่จะยอมให้พวกเขาเข้าถึงข้อมูลส่วนตัว (เราเป็นใคร และ เราเกี่ยวเนื่องยังไงกับผู้อื่น) ในขณะที่เชื่อมต่อเราเข้ากับเพื่อนของเรา แพลตฟอร์มโซเชียลมีเดียเหล่านี้ก็ได้กำลังทำการ รวบรวม จัดเก็บ รักษา และทำเงินจากข้อมูลเหล่านี้ ข้อมูลของเรานี่แหละ สำหรับรายได้ที่มาจากการโฆษณา และนั่นแหละคือปัญหา ด้วยการพยายามหาทางออกให้เรื่องเหล่านี้ สตาร์ทอัพจำนวนหนึ่งสามารถใช้ประโยชน์จากเทคโนโลยีบล็อกเชนและระบบจัดเก็บแบบกระจายศูนย์ ไม่เพียงแต่สร้างแนวคิด แต่ตระหนักถึงมาตรฐานและแอปพลิเคชั่นของ Web3 อีกด้วย และ CyberConnect ก็คือหนึ่งในนั้น โปรโตคอลโซเชียลกราฟแบบกระจายศูนย์, CyberConnect ขับเคลื่อน Metaverse และ Dapps ด้วยการมีปฏิสัมพันธ์ของมนุษย์และการเชื่อมต่อที่ดีขึ้น

### แล้วคุณหมายถึงอะไรหละ ที่บอก “โซเชียลกราฟ”?

ข้อมูลสำคัญจำนวนมากที่เรามอบให้โซเชียลมีเดีย Web2 แบบรวมศูนย์คือความสัมพันธ์ทางสังคมของเรา เราเชื่อมโยงถึงใครและอย่างไร ด้วยจากการเชื่อมต่อรายบุคคลเหล่านี้แล้วนั้น ยักษ์ใหญ่ด้านโซเชียลมีเดีย เช่น Facebook สามารถสร้างโซเชียลกราฟขึ้นมาได้ (การทำแผนที่การเชื่อมต่อทั่วโลก) บางอย่างเราก็ไม่อาจสามารถที่จะติดตามได้ด้วยซ้ำ ยกตัวอย่างเช่น หลานสาวของพี่สะใภ้ของแม่ของจอห์นเป็นภรรยาเพื่อนของสามีของเจน หรือหลานคนโตของลุงของโดนัลด์กำลังออกเดทกับลูกสาวของเพื่อนร่วมงานของเดซี่ ฯลฯ (*งงมากบอกเลย*) คุณคงเข้าใจแหละ ในปัจจุบันยุคของ Web2, บริษัทต่างพากันใช้จ่ายไปอย่างมากเพื่อให้ได้มาซึ่งข้อมูลดังกล่าว และได้สร้างโซเชียลกราฟที่กระจัดกระจายของตัวเอง หรือก็คือ  - สวนที่มีกำแพง (หรือก็หมายถึงองค์กรที่มีอำนาจสูงสุดในการควบคุมข้อมูลนั้นๆในพื้นที่ของตัวเอง) ซึ่งก็น่าแดกดันยิ่งนัก ที่ถือว่าเป็นทรัพสินย์ที่มีค่าสูงสุดและเป็นแบบอย่างให้กับโมเดลธุรกิจที่ขับเคลื่อนด้วยโฆษณาของพวกบริษัทเหล่านี้

### แล้วมันมีปัญหายังไงหละ?

เยอะเลยแหละ การใช้ที่ไม่ปลอดภัยและไม่มีประสิทธิภาพของข้อมูล การปิดกั้นการสร้างรายได้ของเนื้อหา อุปสรรคที่สูงในการเข้ามาของนักพัฒนา ลิสต์พวกนี้ก็ยังมีต่อไปเรื่อยๆ เราจะกล่าวถึงสิ่งสำคัญโดยเฉพาะละกัน

สำหรับผู้ใช้งานและผู้บริโภค มันมีราคาของการเปลี่ยนไปใช้แพลตฟอร์มใหม่ที่สูงอยู่เสมอ ต้องสมัครบัญชีใหม่ กดติดตามเพื่อนอีกครั้ง หัวเสียเมื่อเพื่อนบางคนไม่กดติดตามกลับอีก ลองนึกดูว่าถ้ามีการเข้าสู่ระบบแบบสากล ซึ่งสิ่งนี้มีอยู่แล้ว ต้องขอบคุณ Ethereum address และภายในที่อยู่นั้นก็เก็บการเชื่อมต่อของคุณทั้งหมด ทุกๆครั้งที่คุณเข้าสู่ระบบเข้าไปในแพลตฟอร์มใหม่ๆด้วยบัญชีนี้ คุณสามารถดูรายชื่อเพื่อนและการติดตามจากแพลตฟอร์มอื่นๆทั้งหมดของคุณได้ ข้อมูลโซเชียลกราฟกลายเป็นสินทรัพย์ส่วนบุคคลและพกพาได้ที่คุณสามารถแพ็คของละออกไปได้เลย ทำลายกำแพงระหว่างแพลตฟอร์มและชุมชน ละสิ่งที่ดีกว่านั้นคือคุณได้เป็นเจ้าของข้อมูลส่วนบุคคลนั้นจริงๆเป็นครั้งแรก ได้ตัดสินใจว่าจะเอาอะไรเข้าไปเก็บและอะไรที่ดีสำหรับการแสดงผล

อุปสรรคที่ยิ่งใหญ่กว่านั้นได้ขวางทางนักพัฒนาไว้อยู่ พื้นที่โซเชียลมีเดียในปัจจุบันนี้ไม่เพียงเป็นแต่ศูนย์รวมอำนาจที่มากกว่าภาคการเงินเท่านั้น แต่อาจมีการแข่งแข่งขันที่มากกว่าเช่นกัน  
 สำหรับแต่ละแอปพลิเคชั่นที่พยายามจะสร้างผลลัพธ์ให้คนมองเห็นในพื้นที่แออัดนี้นั้น นักพัฒนาจำเป็นที่จะต้องสร้างโซเชียลกราฟใหม่ทุกครั้ง มันใช้ทั้งเวลา เงิน ความพยายาม และ ความโชคดีนิดนึง  
 อย่างไรก็ตาม จะเกิดอะไรขึ้นถ้ามีโซเชียลกราฟที่เป็น open-sourced ที่ปราศจากเจ้าของแบบรวมศูนย์และให้ทุกคนสามารถสร้างต่อจากตรงนี้ได้หละ? แอปพลิเคชั่นใดๆที่มีประโยชน์ใช้สอยและความบันเทิงที่แข่งแกร่งสามารถเบ่งบานได้อย่างง่ายๆเลย โดยไม่ต้องเปลืองทรัพยากรส่วนใหญ่ในการสร้างสิ่งที่มีอยู่แล้วขึ้นมาใหม่

### วิธีแก้ปัญหามีลักษณะเป็นยังไงหละ

CyberConnect คือโซเชียลกราฟโปรโตคอลแบบกระจายศูนย์ที่สนับสนุนโครงสร้างพื้นฐาน Web3 และเชิญชวนแอปพลิเคชั่นต่างๆให้มาสร้างขึ้นบนโครงสร้างพื้นฐานเหล่านี้ เราได้ทำการจัดเตรียม Module โซเชียลกราฟที่ได้มาตรฐานซึ่งเป็น open-sourced และเข้ากันได้กับหลายบล็อกเชน  
 เป็นโซเชียลกราฟที่มีชุมชนเป็นเจ้าของ และด้วยข้อมูลที่พกพาไปไหนก็ได้นำความเป็นไปได้ที่ไม่มีที่สิ้นสุดให้แก่ Web3 เกม, แอปส่งข้อความ, ฟีดข่าว, Metaverse, และอื่นๆอีกมากมาย ทำลายกำแพงระหว่างชุมชนและนิยามการปฏิสัมพันธ์ของมนุษย์ขึ้นมาใหม่ เพื่อให้ได้ลิ้มรสชาติ เราได้พัฒนา [CyberChat](https://www.cyberch.at/) เพื่อที่จะแสดงให้เห็นว่ากราฟข้อมูลถูกนำไปใช้ประโยชน์ได้อย่างไรอีกด้วย

title: NBATopShot新人攻略
body:
## NBA TOP SHOT是什么？

NBA Top Shot 是一个基于区块链的平台，允许球迷购买、出售和交易特定的、官方许可的视频集锦的编号版本。NBA 剪出精彩片段，然后 Dapper Labs 决定他们要出售的每个精彩片段的数量和编号。他们将精彩片段放入数字包中，就像常规交易卡一样，并在官方 NBA Top Shot 网站上以不同的价格出售这些包。礼包价格取决于精彩片段的质量、明星水平和卡的属性。简单地说，NBA TOP SHOT可以理解为一种NFT（[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-fungible_token](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-fungible_token)），是电子球星卡。

介绍一下NBA TOP SHOT的项目背景。它的背后团队是Dapper Labs，这个团队在17年开发出了非常火爆的加密猫(cryptokitties)项目，也是最早的区块链游戏，而且很多巨星都投资过Dapper Labs，比如乔丹和杜兰特。同时杜兰特、魔术师约翰逊等都曾正式宣布使用NBATopShot发售他们个人的NFT。另外，TOP SHOT基于的区块链是flow，Flow 是一个快速的、分散的、对开发者友好的区块链，大家感兴趣可以直接看他们的官网[https://www.onflow.org/](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//www.onflow.org/)。

最近在twitter上看到一个调查，78%的活跃的NFT购买者是通过NBA TOP SHOT入圈的，可见NBA TOP SHOT的影响力有多大。

![调查显示78%的NFT玩家通过NBATopShot进入NFT领域](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-80e26f106ff24708bdfb608e8eb3ca46_b.jpg)

## 为了玩NBA TOP SHOT你需要准备什么？

### 梯子

目前NBA TOP SHOT会ban中国区的IP，所以你需要有一个梯子，而且在使用梯子的时候需要开**全局模式**。

### 数字货币or国外的信用卡

因为是基于区块链的游戏，所以使用数字货币是最方便的，信用卡会有比较高的手续费。大家要买卖数字货币需要到交易所，目前比较知名的交易所有币安，OkEx，Huobi等等。

## NBA TOP SHOT有哪些玩法？

接下来进入正题：NBA TOP SHOT有哪些玩法？首先我们在浏览器打开NBA TOP SHOT的页面。

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-01e26a94df4897de1dde7bd84062f3c9_b.jpg)

可以看到顶部的导航栏的几个板块。

### PACKS

TOP SHOT最有意思的地方应该就是PACK DROP了，项目方会定期发售一些包，一般来说每个包中会有几个moment，包和moment都有不同的级别。

目前包有三个级别：

* common:这种包属于很普通的包，价格一般也比较便宜，正常的一般都是9美刀，也有14美刀的时候，比如今年的季后赛包。包中含有三个common moment。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6f66f86044029efa5752ce1098bd2296_b.jpg)

* rare:这种包相对稀有一些，价格相对也会高一些，早期的价格一般在20多刀，近期很多也都到99刀了。包中只有一个rare moment和若干个common moment。
* legendary:这种包是最稀有的，也是最贵的，最近的总决赛的legendary包价格是799刀，之前的也有999刀的pack，当然也有200多刀的比较便宜的包。这种pack里有一个legendary moment、rare moment(数量不确定，视包而定)和common moment（数量不确定，视包而定）。

这个网址[https://blog.nbatopshot.com/category/drops](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//blog.nbatopshot.com/category/drops)有历来发的包的明细，可以看一下。

介绍完了包的分类，我们紧接着说一下moment的分类，TOP SHOT有透露moment总共是有五种级别，但是目前发售的只有四种，在Pack的级别的基础上加了一种fandom级别。

* common:最普通的moment，common pack中开出的都是这种moment，这种moment的发行量比较大，一般从1000-40000个不等。面前来看，早期发售的common moment一般都是几千个左右，而现在的common moment很多都已经到了10000多，甚至40000的数量。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-386f9835f736f59c5f94822e8f31cb53_b.jpg)

* fandom:这个是最近刚推出没多久的一种级别，具体可以看这篇博客[https://blog.nbatopshot.com/posts/fandom-tier](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//blog.nbatopshot.com/posts/fandom-tier)，简单地说fandom是介于common和rare之间的，而且它的数量并不是确定的，而是根据大家对这个moment的需求来决定它的数量，具体方式讲到挑战部分会更清楚一些。这种包的获取方式目前来看有两种，一个是通过做挑战赢得奖励来获得，另外就是买common pack来获得，比如最近的WNBA的pack drop里很多都是fandom级别。下面是当前市场上所有的fandom级别的moment,可以看出fandom的数量和common其实差别不大，多的会接近30000个，少的只有1000多个。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fa457454f8ac1e7054b47e8371a22dab_b.jpg)

* rare:稀有的moment,这种moment在rare pack开出来。这种moment的数量一般在299-2021个之间。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad89b52006f584b666745504a4cb8e33_b.jpg)

* legendary:目前为止最稀有的moment，这种moment在legendary pack中开出来。数量在25-120个之间。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d4dba6379a0353d27560a29831512bb2_b.jpg)

* ultimate:这种级别的moment是最稀有的，但是目前没有发行。

### MARKETPLACE

顾名思义，这里就是二级市场，包中开出来的moment可以在挂单交易，你也可以在这里买别人挂出的moment。市场支持通过不同的条件筛选，如下所示。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-90327bb1a1a4cc929782d770b29c2e0e_b.jpg)

### COMMUNITY

这里支持搜索所有的TOP SHOT的用户，可以看到他们的收藏。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-35dc6b7234e2a361ec7bae3d597a00fa_b.jpg)

另外，这里还有BLOG的入口，官方的一些文章在这里都可以找到。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc11e2c3048de8598380e41098b0ec22_b.jpg)

### COLLECTIONS

这里就是你自己的收藏部分，你可以看你自己拥有的moment。

### CHALLENGES

顾名思义，挑战就是你完成了一些任务之后官方会送一些奖励，分为两部分：challenges和showcase challenges。其实两者的区别不大，玩法都是按照要求集齐一些moment，然后到时候官方就会给你发奖励，只不过showcase challenge会要求你把那些要求的moments放到一个showcase里面，这里的showcase就类似于橱窗展示一样。比如最近showcase challenge就是要求收集五张WNBA的moment，然后做成一个showcase，保留到截至时间之后官方就会送你一个奖励moment。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-318ffdc7c4d170eb979e1aae9bcd2b37_b.jpg)

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3f8c4f56cb77967cf2cd11db8a0a77ef_b.jpg)

## 购买流程

下面进入正题，给大家讲讲如何购买pack和在marketplace上购买moment。

### 如何入金？

按照如下流程走：

进入网页，鼠标指向右上角小人，然后点击MY DAPPER WALLET。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3bf7c1914eb8f01294d5deaac9e3bf42_b.jpg)

之后出现如下界面，然后点击下面的add fund to your balance。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-37c57e04fc4580b1b03a241f10281c94_b.jpg)

然后出现如下界面。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-85cbef104bc059f345679f5bba4697c0_b.jpg)

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7895da1b7e3005300f99cc08e5affb51_b.jpg)

可以看出信用卡需要5-7%的交易费，所以建议还是使用加密货币。

点击pay with crypto之后会弹出如下窗口。

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4891d45f16a8a4f4fc1b3414517a51d1_b.jpg)

可以看出是通过coinbase交易所充值的，而且注意看Warning，通过BSC和HECO网络充值是到不了的，我自己选ERC-20是可以到账的。

然后点击之后出现如下界面，然后选择自己喜欢的币种点击。我这里选择的是USDC，然后向那个地址转账就好了。可以使用Metamask的Chrome插件转账，也可以直接从交易所提现，目前来看提USDC的话手续费最低的是Huobi，手续费是2刀。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7a1fa86ea03ebab2603e4d8497800898_b.jpg)

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-15ebf60406db309e43091d9c918d1580_b.jpg)

转账成功之后，余额就可以看到了。

### 购买pack

经过以上入金的步骤，我们就可以购买pack了。点击导航栏的Packs。可以看到有一个starter pack和booster pack。对于每一个新注册的用户，官方都提供了一个starter pack（最近我发现这个包可以买两次，即一下子买两个这样的包）。另外的Booster pack一般是你买了starter pack之后，网站会让你选择一个你的主队（你喜欢的球队），然后如果你在市场上买了3个该球队相关的moment之后你就符合要求，可以买一个booster pack。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ba19521bf89c170a3699a21fd3845624_b.jpg)

下面一之前买的包为例，给大家展示一下买包的过程。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b7d87e9455638d1a038c14dc24d6e892_b.jpg)

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9fc9ea921b7510ea4f412cf84a2753a0_b.jpg)

点击buy now之后就会弹出如下界面。

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fcd2d7cb208379e2ebe63e6a52e7a14d_b.jpg)

我们可以看到有三种方式可以买包，如果你上一步执行入金，你就可以使用你的Dapper Wallet的余额购买。或者另一种方式是使用Flow(flow区块链的代币，目前在各大交易所都可以交易)，如果使用flow的话，需要连接flow的钱包，目前支持的钱包有Ledger和Blocto，我自己使用的是Blocto（不知道如何下载或者如何从交易所向钱包转账的可以私戳我），以下是假设你已经在钱包存入足够的flow。

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cc7e0850f898e06deb6238dbf52523bd_b.jpg)

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-627abd82b94e2c3a7e1260fd2ce8c26f_b.jpg)

然后会要求填写你Blocto钱包的账户，填写之后会出现如下界面。

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8a65f7f0cb63bcc88f47ce15018859d9_b.jpg)

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b016bb8ab4d2c3e1f20893ad9b6fd23c_b.jpg)

然后点击Confirm之后还会弹出一些界面如下。这里其实就是一些智能合约，点击Approval之后就可以了。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9876d84663a51ada528c0898d8fd1d3f_b.jpg)

之后就支付完成了。

接着上面说买包的第三种方式，就是和之前入金一样的方式，这里就不赘述了。

以上任意三种方式完成之后，就会看到这样的界面。这就代表你已经买包成功了！赶紧开包享受一下吧！当然，也可以点击右上角的Open it later,这样就会存到Collection中的My packs,可以之后再打开。

### 购买moment

我们可以在市场上购买moment，由于不同的moment有不同的编号，所以相同的moment由于不同的编号在市场上挂单的价格也不同，一般来说序号越靠前价格越高，以及和球员的球衣号码相同的价格也比较高。

搜索自己想要的球员或者球队，然后点进去，点击select and buy。

![img](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b2bad21f2b58d34180668e4b5d2b90e8_b.jpg)

然后点击BUY。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2ad2491dee5bf29da5e8f9b76fdbc2a6_b.jpg)

之后会跳到付款界面。可以看到，目前只支持信用卡和余额支付，信用卡有手续费。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-09a659acc68451602ac84707407a2b3c_b.jpg)

付款之后过一会就会到自己的collection中看到了。

## 常用的网站

有几个常用的分析交易数据的网站，给大家推荐一下。

第一个是Momentranks,我个人比较喜欢用，功能比较齐全。基本的市场分析、momentrack都有。

[https://momentranks.com/topshot](https://momentranks.com/topshot)

第二个evalute.market我用的不多，但是功能还是比较全的。

[evaluate.marketevaluate.market/topshot/collections/analyze](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//evaluate.market/topshot/collections/analyze)

另外我专门写了一篇关于NBATopShot数据分析网站的文章，欢迎大家阅读。

[https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/473117091](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/473117091)

## 总结

在经济文献中，物品往往存在两大价值阵营：**功能价值和享受价值**，即“我能用这个东西做什么”以及“我有多喜欢这个东西”。自从TOP SHOT出来之后这两种价值也一直伴随着它，对于很多人来说，功能价值可能更重要一些，因为很多moment是有巨大的升值空间的，尤其在早期的时候。前几天詹姆斯的一个Moment卖出了23万美刀的历史最高价。但是我相信对于绝大部分人来说，真正吸引他们的是享受价值，举个例子，如果你是一个杜兰特的球迷，想一下拥有一个今年东部半决赛最后杜兰特踩线两分的moment是一件多么幸福的事。

另外，我们可以发现NBA TOP SHOT团队是在有认真做事的，比如休赛季的几个动作:在拉斯维加斯的夏季联赛现场买包，以及最近刚和WNBA合作推出WNBA包。以及，我们可以打开脑洞畅想一下未来的一些场景：

* 如果NBA TOP SHOT发行了乔丹最后一投，詹姆斯"The Block"以及科比的最后一战的moment会是怎样的场景?TOP SHOT中已经有run it back系列的包，里面不乏很多经典的时刻：比如诺维茨基面对安东尼的绝杀球，乔治在步行者期间的360大风车。
* 如果TOP SHOT不禁大陆的IP，大陆这么多球迷进场又会是什么样子？
* 再开一下脑洞，如果TOP SHOT和NBA 2K合作，推出paly2earn的模式，通过打游戏来获取卡牌，完善经济激励机制，又会是什么样子？

最近的NFT 大火，充满了投机情绪，而TOP SHOT则相对平静，我想一个主要原因是TOP SHOT做到现在发行量已经比较大了，很难投机。但是我们想想NFT这一波过了之后有多少项目会是一地鸡毛？一个项目真正要做成是要靠天时地利和人和，需要项目方持续地改善体验，我认为TOP SHOT的团队是在认真做事，所以，希望TOP SHOT越来越好，大家也越来越喜欢这个游戏。

title: What is a wallet?
body:
Don’t look for a digital wallet in your pants pocket or purse. The wallet we’re talking about here is what you’ll need to financially transact in the blockchain world, manage your collection of cryptocurrencies, store your NFT tokens, and interact with decentralized apps. Your wallet and its contents are secured by a “private key” (password), a wholly-unique-to-you recovery phrase or series of words that allow just you *and you alone* to access your wallet.  Should you wish to transact to/from your wallet, you’ll also have a “public key” that serves as its digital address that allows you to send currency or stored assets to someone else, and vice versa. 

Wallets come in two flavors: “hot” and “cold”. Hot wallets are stored online which provides ease and immediacy in using them, but as with anything online, security vulnerabilities may occur that could pose severe, perhaps catastrophic risk to your wallet’s holdings. Cold wallets also use private and public keys, but these wallets are kept offline, say, on paper or in a secondary drive designed for that purpose, and thus cannot be exposed to online vulnerability (but cold wallets are still vulnerable should you allow a bad actor to learn your private key).

 There’s no Velcro strip or dainty zipper securing your digital wallet; it’s your private key alone that keep its contents safe…***as long as you NEVER share your private key with anyone!***

title: O que são NFTs?
body:
## Definição

A tecnologia dos NFTs, **Non-Fungible Tokens**, foi creada em 2017 através de contratos inteligentes na blockchain Ethereum. No início de 2021, os NFTs entram de repente em destaque no mundo das criptomoedas e tecnologia subjacente (blockchain).

Um NFT é um tipo de token. **Mas o que são tokens?**

**Tokens** são unidades virtuais que confirmam a posse de certo activo digital. Os tokens operam com base na tecnologia blockchain, aquela que está na base das criptomoedas. Para entender melhor os conceitos **blockchain** e **criptomoeda**, recomendo a leitura deste artigo:

[https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ](https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ)

Entre todos os tokens existentes (mais de 13 000 neste momento - o site [Coingecko](https://www.coingecko.com/) chama-os todos de ‘Coins’, mas na realidade só alguns são moedas) há alguns que se chamam moedas. Uma moeda, ou criptomoeda, é semelhante a uma moeda física, e é um token nativo de certa blockchain. Cada blockchain só tem uma moeda, mas pode ter vários tokens. As moedas tipicamente têm o mesmo nome da blockchain onde operam. Por exemplo, [SOLANA](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solana) (SOL) é a moeda da blockchain Solana, e [SOLCIAL](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solcial) (SLCL) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Por exemplo, [ETHEREUM ou ETHER](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum) (ETH) é a moeda da blockchain Ethereum, e [BASIC ATTENTION TOKEN](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/basic-attention-token) (BAT) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Note-se que tokens que não sejam nativos, i.e não sejam moedas, podem existir em várias blockchains, como é o caso do BAT (tal facto está indicado no campo ‘Contract’, menu **…**, em **Info** - ver link acima).

Os portadores de tokens podem, além de os guardar nas suas carteiras digitais, trocá-los por outros tokens em casas de cambio online, vendê-los (NFTs) em *marketplaces*, oferecê-los, ou usá-los para comprar algo. Existem vários tipos de tokens, entre os quais destaco:

* **Pagamento** – usado para efectuar transações financeiras no mundo digital (moedas como Solana, Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum).
* **Utilitário** – usado para dar acesso a produtos ou serviços baseados em alguma blockchain.

  Todos os tipos anteriores são **fungíveis** (*fungible tokens*), ou seja, podem ser trocados por algo de valor igual – 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa A vale o mesmo que 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa B, ou seja, se as pessoas trocarem as moedas o cenário não se altera. Tal não se passa com os NFTs, pois cada um é único. Diz-se por isso que são **não-fungíveis**.
* **NFT** – certificados digitais únicos de trabalhos originais, onde o criador original terá sempre controlo sobre a forma como o trabalho é licensiado. São compostos por vários elementos, tais como:
  * **conteúdo digital** que representa – ficheiro de imagem, audio, texto, ou vídeo.
  * **criador** – identificação do criador do token.
  * **proprietário** – identificação do actual proprietário do token, o qual será ainda o criador se o token não tiver sido oferecido ou vendido.
  * **preço ou ofertas**, caso esteja à venda ou em leilão.
  * **metadados** – informações sobre o activo digital, como assinatura do criador, descrição, tipo de ficheiro, resolução, histórico de transações, data e hora da sua criação, …

Outra diferença entre **NFTs** e tokens fungíveis (como moedas, por exemplo) é a **indivisibilidade** dos primeiros. Por exemplo, poderás enviar 0.05 Bitcoins a um amigo, mas não poderás fazer o mesmo com 5% de um NFT.

## Valor

Se todos os criadores digitais publicarem os seus novos trabalhos, originais, como NFT, todo aquele que tentar copiar o seu trabalho e certificá-lo como NFT, muito dificilmente terá o seu trabalho reconhecido como original. Isto porque existem mecanismos (e cada vez existirão mais) para saber se certo conteúdo digital já foi publicado mais que uma vez na web como NFT (e.g, vários marketplaces fazem essa fiscalização, em breve existirão **motores de busca de NFTs** – ver websites em baixo, e poderás usar o [motor de busca da Google](https://images.google.com/) para saber a localização de certo ficheiro de imagem).

[https://nftsearch.site/](https://nftsearch.site/)

**Nota**: *se ainda não existir na base de dados, deverás/poderás adicionar o NFT que procuras à mesma*.

[https://hebys.io/](https://hebys.io/)

[https://nftlab.com/](https://nftlab.com/)

[https://nooft.io/](https://nooft.io/)

Regra geral, é possível salvar ou copiar o conteúdo digital de um NFT, seja uma imagem, vídeo, áudio ou documento, mas nunca será possível copiar o NFT. Esse terá sempre um único proprietário. Uma pessoa que crie um NFT com base na cópia  (ficheiro, screenshot) do conteúdo digital de outro NFT, terá sempre em sua posse um NFT distinto, publicado em data posterior à do original.

> *Markets for traditional art and collectibles are thriving despite forgeries, and the issue is even smaller with NFTs* ([ref](https://archive.ph/ptRTw))

Os NFTs podem ser programados para permitir ao criador/autor arrecadar dinheiro sempre que o NFT for vendido, normalmente entre 2.5% a 10% do preço de venda.

## Como Criar e Comercializar?

Qualquer pessoa pode criar algo digitalmente, transformá-lo num NFT em alguma blockchain (processo chamado ‘Minting’ em Inglês), e colocar esse token para venda em algum *marketplace* online. Alguns locais cobram para publiar os teus NFTs. Qualquer marketplace cobra uma taxa do valor de venda de cada NFT, a qual poderá ser suportada pelo comprador ou pelo vendedor, dependendo da plataforma.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GGvxJ9xOJMs4wmx6mBN0S.png?height=530&width=1127)

De modo a poderes comprar um NFT, precisarás de dispor na tua carteira digital da criptomoeda associada à blockchain onde o token está alojado.

title: TINCAN TOKEN: BUILDING WEB3 WORLDS
body:
We are guided by a simple yet powerful vision - to create an agency that designs narratives for the future of web3, and works on behalf of the community.

We take complex visions and translate them into synthetic reality-based futures using the structural language of web3. By envisioning and building web3 narrative worlds we provoke the community to not just tinker with the status quo, but to dismantle it and build something better in its place.

[edition://0x1bFfd5915e38D1D947E247021E99dB8416Bd1AA5?editionId=0](edition://0x1bFfd5915e38D1D947E247021E99dB8416Bd1AA5?editionId=0)

Tincan Token is an experimental new model in collective, decentralized worldbuilding that introduces tokens as interactive design tools to provoke talent and fans to prototype the future and create change. 

**$TINCAN NFT:** serves as part of the storytelling process allowing fans to shape their own Super City and be a part of the story. Holders of $TINCAN  will gain access to an unprecedented journey pushing what’s possible with web3 experiences and engaging fans more than ever, in building web3 worlds.

Each Super City world produces high fidelity outcomes across multiple platforms that are accessed as digital assets. Using a visual language we can all understand we can show people that other realities are possible and that web3 can help us get there. If we map the path to a brighter future, many will join to work towards that outcome.

**TINCAN d.Agency:** A native web3 agency that works on behalf of the community for the community. The success of the d.agency is based on our ability to create value for citizens and society.

![Our vision is to ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/A3RQVzQqLkvlrPqwYl7R6.png?height=1932&width=3001)

Tincan calls on all talent that wants to use their skills and passion to guide the exploration of possible future states. The transformational power of web3 is too complex and daunting for anyone to tackle alone. No single team or organization can begin to design unexpected solutions that disrupt conventional thinking without deep collaboration between ecosystem players, communities, and local governance. 

We want to allow collaborations to emerge organically. $TINCAN NFT together with $TINCAN Token \[not available yet\]  is a mechanism under development to facilitate decentralized collaboration. We are exploring ways to maximize returns for all in a fair manner. 

### About the founder phaethon.eth

I am well-equipped to start up TINCAN TOKEN project using my own background in Design Research, Urbanism and coding on Ethereum. I live and breathe blockchains ever since PARIS CC 2017. Cities and world-building are deep inside my DNA. 

The idea that web3 is a terraforming system that communities can use to create societies that are like those in science fiction stories is an idea worth exploring. Our Web3 Synthetic Worlds model provides the opportunity for a unique and unparallel experimental environment to test narratives and complex systems.

It will take much work for me to take this initial funding and build the community, as well as lead the agency to serve the community. I measure my success by the degree of decentralization that I can progressively achieve. 

## Contact

Email me at phaethon.psichis@protonmail.com  if you have any questions or feedback about the project!

### Notes on the disrupting force of the web3 community, the power of prototypes and the need for a decentralized agency.

> **Web3 has become a future reality system. Anything we prototype we can create**

> **Web3 systems can provoke themselves into existence**

"Web3 has stunned the world by forging a parallel system of finance of unprecedented flexibility and creativity in less than a decade." This demonstrates that within the online bubble of the internet "Web3 systems can provoke themselves into existence". This is largely true because social consensus and economic incentives are embedded into the design of blockchains and enforced at deployment.

> **Building web3 worlds to prototype the future**

A world prototype is a container of an innovative web3 future that allows multiple new stories to emerge, logically and organically, from its development. Integrated stories expand our vision and feed our imagination creating a narrative formed by citizens of the future city. Prototypes provoke future societies into existence, by enabling the envisioning and building of a contextual narrative world before the city is built. The world system constructed on web3 protocols enables interactions to emerge into a reality-based future.

> **Prototypes help us make sense of the future:** 

 On concrete foundations, the ecosystem of web3 can take the necessary steps to realize these futures.

title: Flow生态体育PFP项目盘点
body:
本文着重介绍Flow生态上体育相关的PFP项目，同时会有少量其他项目的介绍。

## Ballerz

![BALLER #2623](https://images.ongaia.com/ipfs/QmaUhmEgy5Znagz2ayY2uyn5Xdbsvzm8PkBM1GghtsXihv/9453.png)

Ballerz是一个主打篮球特色的像素生成类PFP项目，也是目前为止Flow上交易资金量（一级市场+二级市场）排名最高的PFP项目，仅次于Dapper的一众亲儿子项目NBATopShot、NFLALLDAY、 UFCStrike。交易网址：<https://ongaia.com/ballerz>

**NFT属性**：Ballerz拥有扣篮、投射、防守、球队等11种不同的属性，属性值高以及某些特殊的属性会有加成，也反映在价格上。

**价格走势**：Ballerz的预售价格是$200刀，目前地板价$350，地板最高点到过接近$2000的位置。截止目前最高成交价为10w刀。

**球星联动**：Ballerz吸引了多名知名NBA球星入驻，包括NBA75大球星多米尼克·威尔金斯，迈阿密热火队球星邓肯·罗宾逊以及WNBA2017年选秀状元Kelsey Plum。

![NBA75大球星多米尼克·威尔金斯推文](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zeliangchu/PicGo_img_storage/main/imgimage-20220517163951410.png)

**持有福利**：Ballerz为持有者空投了Sneakerz NFT，在未来的游戏中球鞋将作为道具发挥重要作用。同时还可以享受限定周边等。

**社区建设**：Ballerz的社区建设也非常用心，组织了多次持有者的Party，并邀请持有者线下NBA观赛。同时还有一大批鲸鱼自发的为持有者提供各种各样的福利，目前鲸鱼们正在举行每周一次的抽奖送Ballerz和Sneakerz活动，来鼓励持有者们从市场撤单。可以看出，Ballerz的社区忠诚度很高。

![Ballerz社群Party](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FPZbD5cWYAQtUkC?format=jpg&name=large)

**数据网站**：

<https://ballerz.rayvin.io/> 支持查看交易数 持有者 地板价等各种数据，是目前最全的数据网站

<https://www.ballerz.co/> 可以查询所有Ballerz的属性

<https://rarity.nifty.so/collection/ballerz> Ballerz稀有度排名

<https://rarity.nifty.so/collection/sneakerz> Sneakerz稀有度排名

**代币**：之前项目方AMA的时候暂时没有具体的发币计划，但是当Ballerz游戏推出之后，代币发行会在考虑范围内。

## Flunks

![Flunks](https://pbs.twimg.com/card_img/1525171014572949506/q96mVs0c?format=jpg&name=small)

Flunks我之前写过一个[Twitter Thread](https://twitter.com/crypto__alpha/status/1511002512655990787?s=20&t=yRdlsy6KhRPKeaQoy_BlhA)专门介绍，大家可以参考。

之前提到过的我就不再赘述，讲一下Flunks最近更新的动态。

最近引入了一个新的机制叫做伪质押，简单地说就是从市场撤单会让你的Flunks提前进入学校的学期（因为你的Flunks其实是一个个学生），这样的话你的Flunks也就可以更早地毕业，毕业之后的Flunks会升级为一个全新的Flunks，同时你还会拥有一些特殊的链上特征和治理特权，详情也可以参考[官方的白皮书](https://flunks.gitbook.io/whitepaper/mechanics/graduating)。

![市场挂单明显下降](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FSwfjS0X0AEmweM?format=jpg&name=small)

**代币**：官网白皮书列出代币$GUM，但是没有展示任何内容。

## Flovatar

![Flovatar](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FS6i8YmXwAYQ6Ic?format=png&name=900x900)

Flovatar是Flow上一个比较新奇的PFP项目，因为他的PFP是用户自己创作捏出来的。用户购买NFT部件，然后通过生成器选取自己喜欢的部件并mint出完全个性化的NFT。

**NFT属性**：相关介绍可以参考[文章](https://mirror.xyz/0xE2C4fDb22f3c2138A0e57e74963589538e79872a/obemtXHnKRI5E4J3fe5f5Cj-bgafXz3zN2Q0E0a6SJg)，目前还可以从市场上获得各种组件从而mint flovatar。

**价格走势**：目前市场上不同部件的价格(基于发文时Flow的代币价格)。

* Spark: 19.99 FLOW ($59.77)
* Rare Boosters (4): 13.90 FLOW ($41.56)
* Epic Booster: 38.50 FLOW ($115.12)
* Accessory Flobit: 3.74 FLOW ($11.18)

​mint一个Flovatar的成本大约为76.13 FLOW ($227.63)。

**代币**：明确对持有者空投代币DUST，分为两种类型：对特定时间点之前mint过的持有者OG空投一次性代币；以及对持有者每天空投代币，持续十年。空投数量取决于你的Flovatar的稀有度，计算算法参考[文章](https://blog.flovatar.com/all-about-dust-613ce49cb51a)，也可以通过下面的第一个数据网站直接进行查阅。举个例子，稀有度为5.4的Flovatar每天可以获得7.68枚DUST，每年可以获得2,803.20枚DUST。

**数据网站**：

<https://flov.dev/> 最全的数据网站，可以查询自己的Flovatar的各种属性，同时还有各种排名。

<https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/james.giles/viz/FlovatarSales/MarketDashboard> 侧重于市场交易数据。

## Meta Panda Club

![Meta Panda Club](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_banners/1488735409181839360/1647393617/1080x360)

由NBA球星阿泰斯特背书的PFP项目，总发行量10000个。项目的愿景是去打造一个去中心化的篮球社区。官网链接：<https://metapandaclub.com/>

**持有福利**：持有者会获得和mint价格等值的周边，包括棒球服、T-shirt、卫衣和帆布包等等，而且官网也提到会有NBATopShot的抽奖。创始人Arthur同时也是NFT周边项目[Web3wear](https://web3wear.com/)的创始人，可以预见未来会有更多的新奇周边放出。同时还会有很多的线下活动以及和阿泰的见面会等等。

![周边卫衣](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zeliangchu/PicGo_img_storage/main/imgimage-20220517165103785.png)

**价格走势**：预售mint价格$199，5.18号将开启一轮和知名街球手骨头收集者相关的公售，公售价格$249。目前还未开放二级市场。

**社区建设**：MPC也是篮球强相关的社区，所以也会定期举办篮球相关活动，NBA知名球星德怀特·霍华德曾经出席过之前的线下活动，最近知名街球手骨头收集者也在discord中与粉丝互动。

## Hoodlums

![Hoodlums](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_banners/1428059200446291972/1648872388/1080x360)

Hoodlums是Flow上首个PFP项目，官网链接<https://linktr.ee/HoodlumsNFT>

**NFT属性**：Hoodlums拥有皮肤、纹身、头发等不同的属性，稀有属性对应的Hoodlums价格也会比较高，详情可以参考稀有度网站https://hoodlumsnft.com/

**价格走势**：Hoodlums的mint价格是$123.45，目前地板价$360，可以说是目前Flow上最保值的PFP项目。

**持有福利**：Hoodlums为持有者空投了吉他NFT。

**社区建设**：Hoodlums由于是Flow上第一个PFP项目，所以也拥有一大批忠实粉丝，项目方也经常会在LA线下举行各种聚会。线上每周三也会举办线上活动，详情关注推特 <https://twitter.com/HangwithLums>

**数据网站**： <https://hoodlumsnft.com/> 查看Hoodlums和空投的吉他NFT的稀有度

## Driverz

![Driverz](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_banners/1478434635470327809/1647451943/1080x360)

Driverz是主打赛车运动的PFP项目，目前正在预售准备阶段，官网链接https://driverznft.io/

**NFT属性**：主要包括头盔（200+）、紧身衣（50+）、背景（8）、队伍（30)和技能等不同的属性，详情可以参考[文章](https://driverzf1nft.medium.com/driverz-art-breakdown-1d02900c61f6https://driverzf1nft.medium.com/driverz-art-breakdown-1d02900c61f6)。

**价格走势**：目前项目正在预热阶段，5.24号开始白名单预售，5.26号开始公售，销售价格$222，总量10000个。

**持有福利**：目前在官方的[medium文章](https://driverzf1nft.medium.com/driverz-roadmap-utility-d2a86948f37f)中介绍的持有者福利包括NFT空投、NFT周边以及线下活动等，持有的NFT越多相应获得的空投也越稀有。另外路线图中提到比较特殊的机制是定期回购，项目方每年会进行四次回购，从市场上购买地板Driverz。

## CryptoPiggos

![CryptoPiggos](https://www.rareworx.com/static/media/header-img.0f4f78b6.png)

总量10000的加密猪PFP，Piggos 及其众多不同的配饰、表情、服装和背景均采用手绘和精心设计。

**NFT属性**：CryptoPiggos拥有各种各样不同的属性，可以点击链接https://www.rareworx.com/piggos查看不同的属性以及其在总量中占据的比例。

**价格走势**：初始mint价格为18Flow，现在在[BlocotBay](https://bay.blocto.app/)（Flow上的NFT交易市场）的地板价为5Flow。

**持有福利**：限定周边，同时持有者还有机会抽奖获得价值$20000的旅行福利等。同时项目正在进入下一个阶段，拥有两个初代CryptoPiggos，可以获得一个药水空投，药水可以用来铸造二代CryptoPiggos。

## GoatedGoats

![Goat](https://goatedgoats.com/carousel/goat2.png)

总量10000的山羊NFT，由基本的山羊以及不同的配件组成。

**价格走势**： 山羊的身体初始mint价格为35Flow，配件包的mint价格为10Flow，目前没有支持的二级交易市场。

**社区建设**：在mint之前GoatedGoats在推特和Discord举行了大量的giveaway活动，吸引了大量用户。目前正在结合NBA季后赛举行相关的挑战。

title: O que são NFTs?
body:
## Definição

A tecnologia dos NFTs, **Non-Fungible Tokens**, foi creada em 2017 através de contratos inteligentes na blockchain Ethereum. No início de 2021, os NFTs entram de repente em destaque no mundo das criptomoedas e tecnologia subjacente (blockchain).

Um NFT é um tipo de token. **Mas o que são tokens?**

**Tokens** são unidades virtuais que confirmam a posse de certo activo digital. Os tokens operam com base na tecnologia blockchain, aquela que está na base das criptomoedas. Para entender melhor os conceitos **blockchain** e **criptomoeda**, recomendo a leitura deste artigo:

[https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ](https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ)

Entre todos os tokens existentes (mais de 13 000 neste momento - o site [Coingecko](https://www.coingecko.com/) chama-os todos de ‘Coins’, mas na realidade só alguns são moedas) há alguns que se chamam moedas. Uma moeda, ou criptomoeda, é semelhante a uma moeda física, e é um token nativo de certa blockchain. Cada blockchain só tem uma moeda, mas pode ter vários tokens. As moedas tipicamente têm o mesmo nome da blockchain onde operam. Por exemplo, [SOLANA](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solana) (SOL) é a moeda da blockchain Solana, e [SOLCIAL](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solcial) (SLCL) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Por exemplo, [ETHEREUM ou ETHER](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum) (ETH) é a moeda da blockchain Ethereum, e [BASIC ATTENTION TOKEN](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/basic-attention-token) (BAT) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Note-se que tokens que não sejam nativos, i.e não sejam moedas, podem existir em várias blockchains, como é o caso do BAT (tal facto está indicado no campo ‘Contract’, menu **…**, em **Info** - ver link acima).

Os portadores de tokens podem, além de os guardar nas suas carteiras digitais, trocá-los por outros tokens em casas de cambio online, vendê-los (NFTs) em *marketplaces*, oferecê-los, ou usá-los para comprar algo. Existem vários tipos de tokens, entre os quais destaco:

* **Pagamento** – usado para efectuar transações financeiras no mundo digital (moedas como Solana, Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum).
* **Utilitário** – usado para dar acesso a produtos ou serviços baseados em alguma blockchain.

  Todos os tipos anteriores são **fungíveis** (*fungible tokens*), ou seja, podem ser trocados por algo de valor igual – 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa A vale o mesmo que 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa B, ou seja, se as pessoas trocarem as moedas o cenário não se altera. Tal não se passa com os NFTs, pois cada um é único. Diz-se por isso que são **não-fungíveis**.
* **NFT** – certificados digitais únicos de trabalhos originais, onde o criador original terá sempre controlo sobre a forma como o trabalho é licensiado. São compostos por vários elementos, tais como:
  * **conteúdo digital** que representa – ficheiro de imagem, audio, texto, ou vídeo.
  * **criador** – identificação do criador do token.
  * **proprietário** – identificação do actual proprietário do token, o qual será ainda o criador se o token não tiver sido oferecido ou vendido.
  * **preço ou ofertas**, caso esteja à venda ou em leilão.
  * **metadados** – informações sobre o activo digital, como assinatura do criador, descrição, tipo de ficheiro, resolução, histórico de transações, data e hora da sua criação, …

Outra diferença entre **NFTs** e tokens fungíveis (como moedas, por exemplo) é a **indivisibilidade** dos primeiros. Por exemplo, poderás enviar 0.05 Bitcoins a um amigo, mas não poderás fazer o mesmo com 5% de um NFT.

## Valor

Se todos os criadores digitais publicarem os seus novos trabalhos, originais, como NFT, todo aquele que tentar copiar o seu trabalho e certificá-lo como NFT, muito dificilmente terá o seu trabalho reconhecido como original. Isto porque existem mecanismos (e cada vez existirão mais) para saber se certo conteúdo digital já foi publicado mais que uma vez na web como NFT (e.g, vários marketplaces fazem essa fiscalização, em breve existirão **motores de busca de NFTs** – ver websites em baixo, e poderás usar o [motor de busca da Google](https://images.google.com/) para saber a localização de certo ficheiro de imagem).

[https://nftsearch.site/](https://nftsearch.site/)

**Nota**: *se ainda não existir na base de dados, deverás/poderás adicionar o NFT que procuras à mesma*.

[https://hebys.io/](https://hebys.io/)

[https://nftlab.com/](https://nftlab.com/)

title: O que são NFTs?
body:
## Definição

A tecnologia dos NFTs, **Non-Fungible Tokens**, foi creada em 2017 através de contratos inteligentes na blockchain Ethereum. No início de 2021, os NFTs entram de repente em destaque no mundo das criptomoedas e tecnologia subjacente (blockchain).

Um NFT é um tipo de token. **Mas o que são tokens?**

**Tokens** são unidades virtuais que confirmam a posse de certo activo digital. Os tokens operam com base na tecnologia blockchain, aquela que está na base das criptomoedas. Para entender melhor os conceitos **blockchain** e **criptomoeda**, recomendo a leitura deste artigo:

[https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ](https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ)

Entre todos os tokens existentes (mais de 13 000 neste momento - o site [Coingecko](https://www.coingecko.com/) chama-os todos de ‘Coins’, mas na realidade só alguns são moedas) há alguns que se chamam moedas. Uma moeda, ou criptomoeda, é semelhante a uma moeda física, e é um token nativo de certa blockchain. Cada blockchain só tem uma moeda, mas pode ter vários tokens. As moedas tipicamente têm o mesmo nome da blockchain onde operam. Por exemplo, [SOLANA](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solana) (SOL) é a moeda da blockchain Solana, e [SOLCIAL](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solcial) (SLCL) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Por exemplo, [ETHEREUM ou ETHER](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum) (ETH) é a moeda da blockchain Ethereum, e [BASIC ATTENTION TOKEN](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/basic-attention-token) (BAT) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Note-se que tokens que não sejam nativos, i.e não sejam moedas, podem existir em várias blockchains, como é o caso do BAT (tal facto está indicado no campo ‘Contract’, menu **…**, em **Info** - ver link acima).

Os portadores de tokens podem, além de os guardar nas suas carteiras digitais, trocá-los por outros tokens em casas de cambio online, vendê-los (NFTs) em *marketplaces*, oferecê-los, ou usá-los para comprar algo. Existem vários tipos de tokens, entre os quais destaco:

* **Pagamento** – usado para efectuar transações financeiras no mundo digital (moedas como Solana, Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum).
* **Utilitário** – usado para dar acesso a produtos ou serviços baseados em alguma blockchain.

  Todos os tipos anteriores são **fungíveis** (*fungible tokens*), ou seja, podem ser trocados por algo de valor igual – 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa A vale o mesmo que 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa B, ou seja, se as pessoas trocarem as moedas o cenário não se altera. Tal não se passa com os NFTs, pois cada um é único. Diz-se por isso que são **não-fungíveis**.
* **NFT** – certificados digitais únicos de trabalhos originais, onde o criador original terá sempre controlo sobre a forma como o trabalho é licensiado. São compostos por vários elementos, tais como:
  * **conteúdo digital** que representa – ficheiro de imagem, audio, texto, ou vídeo.
  * **criador** – identificação do criador do token.
  * **proprietário** – identificação do actual proprietário do token, o qual será ainda o criador se o token não tiver sido oferecido ou vendido.
  * **preço ou ofertas**, caso esteja à venda ou em leilão.
  * **metadados** – informações sobre o activo digital, como assinatura do criador, descrição, tipo de ficheiro, resolução, histórico de transações, data e hora da sua criação, …

Outra diferença entre **NFTs** e tokens fungíveis (como moedas, por exemplo) é a **indivisibilidade** dos primeiros. Por exemplo, poderás enviar 0.05 Bitcoins a um amigo, mas não poderás fazer o mesmo com 5% de um NFT.

## Valor

Se todos os criadores digitais publicarem os seus novos trabalhos, originais, como NFT, todo aquele que tentar copiar o seu trabalho e certificá-lo como NFT, muito dificilmente terá o seu trabalho reconhecido como original. Isto porque existem mecanismos (e cada vez existirão mais) para saber se certo conteúdo digital já foi publicado mais que uma vez na web como NFT (e.g, vários marketplaces fazem essa fiscalização, em breve existirão **motores de busca de NFTs** – ver websites em baixo, e poderás usar o [motor de busca da Google](https://images.google.com/) para saber a localização de certo ficheiro de imagem).

[https://nftsearch.site/](https://nftsearch.site/)

**Nota**: *se ainda não existir na base de dados, deverás/poderás adicionar o NFT que procuras à mesma*.

[https://hebys.io/](https://hebys.io/)

[https://nftlab.com/](https://nftlab.com/)

[https://nooft.io/](https://nooft.io/)

Regra geral, é possível salvar ou copiar o conteúdo digital de um NFT, seja uma imagem, vídeo, áudio ou documento, mas nunca será possível copiar o NFT. Esse terá sempre um único proprietário. Uma pessoa que crie um NFT com base na cópia  (ficheiro, screenshot) do conteúdo digital de outro NFT, terá sempre em sua posse um NFT distinto, publicado em data posterior à do original.

Os NFTs podem ser programados para permitir ao criador/autor arrecadar dinheiro sempre que o NFT for vendido, normalmente entre 2.5% a 10% do preço de venda.

## Como Criar e Comercializar?

Qualquer pessoa pode criar algo digitalmente, transformá-lo num NFT em alguma blockchain (processo chamado ‘Minting’ em Inglês), e colocar esse token para venda em algum *marketplace* online. title: VIPs01 我们需要在田园上UGC
body:
我们在建设一个村子，位于浙江·太湖南部，靠近上海和杭州。村子有很多古宅，白墙黛瓦，清民风范，保留这样的气质，设计成古风文旅会有很好的沉浸感，应邀的来访者都有好感。这坚定了我们要悉心设计内容的决心。

内容建设和基建不同，集思广益，需要UGC，因此我们希望通过Web3协作共同展开叙事…

![正射影像](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iSVa4Hg7CGGsrvw3oH-VL.jpg?height=500&width=1500)

150户古宅（宅基地）可以改造成商业集群运营20年。民宿、酒肆、茶馆、画廊、曲苑…清明上河繁荣，元宇宙实境。

![古法新酿](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FT7d9xqakTqvVkBV9ExE_.jpg?height=692&width=1440)

古村2020年获得“美丽乡村”立项，桥梁、村道、植被、景观等基础环境改造已经启动。目前基础建设是以公司的组织形式开展的，具体情况会在后面新启篇幅以及AMA中解答。

title: 000 - Looking in the Mirror
body:
Reflecting into My eyes
is a light that wraps around My body
to illuminate all that is outside of Me.

This is My inverse - 
   I shine from the inside.

I can only see everything I am
when My eyelids are closed.

The windows to My soul
are made of a two-way mirror.

What I see is:
an image of My life.

What You see is:
Your reflection in Me.

Certainly, You are not - I or Me,
as I know Myself.

However, to You - I and Me,
are what You are.

Denying Your truth
would erase My existence..

So, if You are both I and Me,
We are one and the same.

The golden rule adores thy neighbor,
yet We all live in the same house.

My brothers and sisters -
I propose we keep the blinds open
and let the sun bare its beauty.

For what I see - is a dream of Me
planted a long time ago
in a field of We.

\-Maclin

title: Voltz for smooth brains
body:
Voltz is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) for Interest Rate Swaps. 

Lets be very basic, an AMM essentially manages the inflow and outflow for the pool of assets, in order to make sure we can all trade with the pool (remember x\*y=k). In case of Voltz, the AMM is divided into 2 parts the Virtual AMM (vAMM) and the Margin Engine.

*Interesting note*

*The vAMM is used for price discovery only, this means we decide on the price through the VAMM, however the execution is completed on the Margin Engine. This is how Voltz can achieve the insane 3000x efficiency and flexibility.*

Now let’s check Interest Rate Swaps, I will try explain why we need them in DeFi. One of the biggest pillars of TradFi is that it can give us fixed interest rates on borrowing or depositing, which allows us to plan and predict our money supply. However, that is not quite possible in DeFi, this is where Voltz comes in and gives the opportunity to swap those variable rates of ours in DeFi. I see this unlocking two huge opportunities, clients can plan their interest earnings with fixed rates thus more stability for the average joe and second is, this unlocks arbitrage and new tools for the variable takers who want that risk (the degens).

TradFi:

* Imagine you have a mortgage, on Voltz you can trade the mortgage interest rate either as Fixed Taker or Variable Taker. Given you are paying variable rates, you can swap them for fixed rates, thus paying fixed interest rate got your mortgage.

DeFI:

* Lets say we are supplying on compound and get cTokens (which constantly accrue variable interest rate), this variable rate can be swapped for a fixed rate on Voltz. Thus giving you a piece of mind on your asset returns, rather than speculate on the variable rates on Compound.

I hope you can more clearly see why Voltz is such a crucial infrastructure component for the entirety of DeFi.

PS.

Obviously my TradFi example is not possible for Voltz (yet)

title: VIPs01 我们需要在田园上UGC
body:
我们在建设一个村子，位于浙江·太湖南部，靠近上海和杭州。村子有很多古宅，白墙黛瓦，清民风范，保留这样的气质，设计成古风文旅会有很好的沉浸感，应邀的来访者都有好感。这坚定了我们要悉心设计内容的决心。

内容建设和基建不同，集思广益，需要UGC，因此我们希望通过Web3协作共同展开叙事…

![正射影像](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iSVa4Hg7CGGsrvw3oH-VL.jpg?height=500&width=1500)

150户古宅（宅基地）可以改造成商业集群运营20年。民宿、酒肆、茶馆、画廊、曲苑…清明上河繁荣，元宇宙实境。

![古法新酿](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FT7d9xqakTqvVkBV9ExE_.jpg?height=692&width=1440)

古村2020年获得“美丽乡村”立项，桥梁、村道、植被、景观等基础环境改造已经启动。目前基础建设是以公司的组织形式开展的，具体情况会在后面新启篇幅以及AMA中解答。

![环境改造](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/O2cKza-N4ohf-o_DCSOiR.jpg?height=300&width=1500)

我们希望代入Web3机制的是“内容叙事”和“运营方式”，这两方面分别定义成“Storyliving”和“Time Bank”。

Storyliving一词来自于迪士尼在加州·奥兰多开发的商业地产项目。当全世界都在围绕Meta建设虚拟场景元宇宙的时候，地球上最会讲故事的公司--迪士尼表示，元宇宙应该是肉身住在童话小镇里，思绪荡漾在故事里。我们也认为，沉浸式的文旅小镇能够带给居住者丰富的生命体验，是贯穿于虚实的元宇宙平台。

Time Bank是流行于欧洲和北美的一种将“付出”(服务)储值的方式，人们之间的相互帮助，或者无形的付出可以被记录、转移、提取，这和基于区块链的数字经济十分相似，我们希望可以借此驱动小镇元宇宙生态。

因此，我们需要找到基于Web3运行机制的设计师、建筑师、规划师、园丁、文案、插画师、代码开发、社群运营、组织管理……并且大家的贡献可以被PoW。

“108 Wise Men”是我们发行在Opensea的NFT，是和贡献者建立联结的信牌。后期将用于登录平台，提交提案和投票等操作。也是未来回馈的凭证。

!["108 Wise Men" NFT](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/c3dBaFj3TVcStK9PZaNsh.jpg?height=2304&width=2778)

相关 Opensea 以及 Twitter 链接：

[https://opensea.io/collection/untitled-collection-50911155](https://opensea.io/collection/untitled-collection-50911155)

[https://twitter.com/Web3Village2022](https://twitter.com/Web3Village2022)

持有NFT拥有古村落生态的“创造权”，同时也是Web3乡村振兴社会实践的参与者，让我们共同协奏一曲赛博情怀的田园牧歌吧\~ 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HuWIAjSNqR09FFUNZdM21.jpg?height=943&width=1800)

title: Flow生态体育PFP项目盘点
body:
本文着重介绍Flow生态上体育PFP相关项目，同时会有少量其他项目的介绍。

## Ballerz

![BALLER #2623](https://images.ongaia.com/ipfs/QmaUhmEgy5Znagz2ayY2uyn5Xdbsvzm8PkBM1GghtsXihv/9453.png)

Ballerz是一个主打篮球特色的像素生成类PFP项目，也是目前为止Flow上交易资金量（一级市场+二级市场）排名最高的PFP项目，仅次于Dapper的一众亲儿子项目NBATopShot、NFLALLDAY、 UFCStrike。交易网址：<https://ongaia.com/ballerz>

**NFT属性**：Ballerz拥有扣篮、投射、防守、球队等11种不同的属性，属性值高以及某些特殊的属性会有加成，也反映在价格上。

**价格走势**：Ballerz的预售价格是$200刀，目前地板价$350，地板最高点到过接近$2000的位置。截止目前最高成交价为10w刀。

**球星联动**：Ballerz吸引了多名知名NBA球星入驻，包括NBA75大球星多米尼克·威尔金斯，迈阿密热火队球星邓肯·罗宾逊以及WNBA2017年选秀状元Kelsey Plum。

![NBA75大球星多米尼克·威尔金斯推文](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zeliangchu/PicGo_img_storage/main/imgimage-20220517163951410.png)

**持有福利**：Ballerz为持有者空投了Sneakerz NFT，在未来的游戏中球鞋将作为道具发挥重要作用。同时还可以享受限定周边等。

**社区建设**：Ballerz的社区建设也非常用心，组织了多次持有者的Party，并邀请持有者线下NBA观赛。同时还有一大批鲸鱼自发的为持有者提供各种各样的福利，目前鲸鱼们正在举行每周一次的抽奖送Ballerz和Sneakerz活动，来鼓励持有者们从市场撤单。可以看出，Ballerz的社区忠诚度很高。

![Ballerz社群Party](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FPZbD5cWYAQtUkC?format=jpg&name=large)

**数据网站**：

<https://ballerz.rayvin.io/> 支持查看交易数 持有者 地板价等各种数据，是目前最全的数据网站

<https://www.ballerz.co/> 可以查询所有Ballerz的属性

<https://rarity.nifty.so/collection/ballerz> Ballerz稀有度排名

<https://rarity.nifty.so/collection/sneakerz> Sneakerz稀有度排名

**代币**：之前项目方AMA的时候暂时没有具体的发币计划，但是当Ballerz游戏推出之后，代币发行会在考虑范围内。

## Flunks

![Flunks](https://pbs.twimg.com/card_img/1525171014572949506/q96mVs0c?format=jpg&name=small)

Flunks我之前写过一个[Twitter Thread](https://twitter.com/crypto__alpha/status/1511002512655990787?s=20&t=yRdlsy6KhRPKeaQoy_BlhA)专门介绍，大家可以参考。

之前提到过的我就不再赘述，讲一下Flunks最近更新的动态。

最近引入了一个新的机制叫做伪质押，简单地说就是从市场撤单会让你的Flunks提前进入学校的学期（因为你的Flunks其实是一个个学生），这样的话你的Flunks也就可以更早地毕业，毕业之后的Flunks会升级为一个全新的Flunks，同时你还会拥有一些特殊的链上特征和治理特权，详情也可以参考[官方的白皮书](https://flunks.gitbook.io/whitepaper/mechanics/graduating)。

![市场挂单明显下降](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FSwfjS0X0AEmweM?format=jpg&name=small)

**代币**：官网白皮书列出代币$GUM，但是没有展示任何内容。

## Flovatar

![Flovatar](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FS6i8YmXwAYQ6Ic?format=png&name=900x900)

Flovatar是Flow上一个比较新奇的PFP项目，因为他的PFP是用户自己创作捏出来的。用户购买NFT部件，然后通过生成器选取自己喜欢的部件并mint出完全个性化的NFT。

**NFT属性**：相关介绍可以参考[文章](https://mirror.xyz/0xE2C4fDb22f3c2138A0e57e74963589538e79872a/obemtXHnKRI5E4J3fe5f5Cj-bgafXz3zN2Q0E0a6SJg)，目前还可以从市场上获得各种组件从而mint flovatar。

**价格走势**：目前市场上不同部件的价格(基于发文时Flow的代币价格)。

* Spark: 19.99 FLOW ($59.77)
* Rare Boosters (4): 13.90 FLOW ($41.56)
* Epic Booster: 38.50 FLOW ($115.12)
* Accessory Flobit: 3.74 FLOW ($11.18)

​mint一个Flovatar的成本大约为76.13 FLOW ($227.63)。

**代币**：明确对持有者空投代币DUST，分为两种类型：对特定时间点之前mint过的持有者OG空投一次性代币；以及对持有者每天空投代币，持续十年。空投数量取决于你的Flovatar的稀有度，计算算法参考[文章](https://blog.flovatar.com/all-about-dust-613ce49cb51a)，也可以通过下面的第一个数据网站直接进行查阅。举个例子，稀有度为5.4的Flovatar每天可以获得7.68枚DUST，每年可以获得2,803.20枚DUST。

**数据网站**：

<https://flov.dev/> 最全的数据网站，可以查询自己的Flovatar的各种属性，同时还有各种排名。

<https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/james.giles/viz/FlovatarSales/MarketDashboard> 侧重于市场交易数据。

## Meta Panda Club

![Meta Panda Club](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_banners/1488735409181839360/1647393617/1080x360)

由NBA球星阿泰斯特背书的PFP项目，总发行量10000个。项目的愿景是去打造一个去中心化的篮球社区。官网链接：<https://metapandaclub.com/>

**持有福利**：持有者会获得和mint价格等值的周边，包括棒球服、T-shirt、卫衣和帆布包等等，而且官网也提到会有NBATopShot的抽奖。创始人Arthur同时也是NFT周边项目[Web3wear](https://web3wear.com/)的创始人，可以预见未来会有更多的新奇周边放出。同时还会有很多的线下活动以及和阿泰的见面会等等。

![周边卫衣](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zeliangchu/PicGo_img_storage/main/imgimage-20220517165103785.png)

**价格走势**：预售mint价格$199，5.18号将开启一轮和知名街球手骨头收集者相关的公售，公售价格$249。目前还未开放二级市场。

**社区建设**：MPC也是篮球强相关的社区，所以也会定期举办篮球相关活动，NBA知名球星德怀特·霍华德曾经出席过之前的线下活动，最近知名街球手骨头收集者也在discord中与粉丝互动。

## Hoodlums

![Hoodlums](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_banners/1428059200446291972/1648872388/1080x360)

Hoodlums是Flow上首个PFP项目，官网链接<https://linktr.ee/HoodlumsNFT>

**NFT属性**：Hoodlums拥有皮肤、纹身、头发等不同的属性，稀有属性对应的Hoodlums价格也会比较高，详情可以参考稀有度网站https://hoodlumsnft.com/

**价格走势**：Hoodlums的mint价格是$123.45，目前地板价$360，可以说是目前Flow上最保值的PFP项目。

**持有福利**：Hoodlums为持有者空投了吉他NFT。

**社区建设**：Hoodlums由于是Flow上第一个PFP项目，所以也拥有一大批忠实粉丝，项目方也经常会在LA线下举行各种聚会。线上每周三也会举办线上活动，详情关注推特 <https://twitter.com/HangwithLums>

**数据网站**： <https://hoodlumsnft.com/> 查看Hoodlums和空投的吉他NFT的稀有度

## Driverz

![Driverz](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_banners/1478434635470327809/1647451943/1080x360)

Driverz是主打赛车运动的PFP项目，目前正在预售准备阶段，官网链接https://driverznft.io/

**NFT属性**：主要包括头盔（200+）、紧身衣（50+）、背景（8）、队伍（30)和技能等不同的属性，详情可以参考[文章](https://driverzf1nft.medium.com/driverz-art-breakdown-1d02900c61f6https://driverzf1nft.medium.com/driverz-art-breakdown-1d02900c61f6)。

**价格走势**：目前项目正在预热阶段，5.24号开始白名单预售，5.26号开始公售，销售价格$222，总量10000个。

**持有福利**：目前在官方的[medium文章](https://driverzf1nft.medium.com/driverz-roadmap-utility-d2a86948f37f)中介绍的持有者福利包括NFT空投、NFT周边以及线下活动等，持有的NFT越多相应获得的空投也越稀有。另外路线图中提到比较特殊的机制是定期回购，项目方每年会进行四次回购，从市场上购买地板Driverz。

## CryptoPiggos

![CryptoPiggos](https://www.rareworx.com/static/media/header-img.0f4f78b6.png)

总量10000的加密猪PFP，Piggos 及其众多不同的配饰、表情、服装和背景均采用手绘和精心设计。

**NFT属性**：CryptoPiggos拥有各种各样不同的属性，可以点击链接https://www.rareworx.com/piggos查看不同的属性以及其在总量中占据的比例。

**价格走势**：初始mint价格为18Flow，现在在[BlocotBay](https://bay.blocto.app/)（Flow上的NFT交易市场）的地板价为5Flow。

**持有福利**：限定周边，同时持有者还有机会抽奖获得价值$20000的旅行福利等。同时项目正在进入下一个阶段，拥有两个初代CryptoPiggos，可以获得一个药水空投，药水可以用来铸造二代CryptoPiggos。

## GoatedGoats

![Goat](https://goatedgoats.com/carousel/goat2.png)

总量10000的山羊NFT，由基本的山羊以及不同的配件组成。

**价格走势**： 山羊的身体初始mint价格为35Flow，配件包的mint价格为10Flow，目前没有支持的二级交易市场。

**社区建设**：在mint之前GoatedGoats在推特和Discord举行了大量的giveaway活动，吸引了大量用户。目前正在结合NBA季后赛举行相关的挑战。

**By Zelig H.SPORT**

title: เหตุใดเราจึงต้องการโซเชียลกราฟแบบกระจายศูนย์?
body:
เมื่อเราลงทะเบียนบนแพลตฟอร์มโซเชียลมีเดียเป็นครั้งแรกนั้น มันแทบเหมือนจะเป็นสัญชาตญานไปแล้วที่จะต้องติดตามรายชื่อดาราที่แนะนำ หัวข้อที่คุณสนใจ และซิงค์รายชื่อติดต่อในโทรศัพท์หรือ Facebook สำหรับเพื่อนที่คุณอาจรู้จัก เราใช้คำแนะนำอัลกอริธึมเหล่านี้เสมือนเป็นสิ่งไม่มีค่าซะจนเราละเลยคำถามที่ว่า รายการพวกนี้สร้างขึ้นมาได้อย่างไร?

และแน่นอน เราตกลงที่จะยอมให้พวกเขาเข้าถึงข้อมูลส่วนตัว (เราเป็นใคร และ เราเกี่ยวเนื่องยังไงกับผู้อื่น) ในขณะที่เชื่อมต่อเราเข้ากับเพื่อนของเรา แพลตฟอร์มโซเชียลมีเดียเหล่านี้ก็ได้กำลังทำการ รวบรวม จัดเก็บ รักษา และทำเงินจากข้อมูลเหล่านี้ ข้อมูลของเรานี่แหละ สำหรับรายได้ที่มาจากการโฆษณา และนั่นแหละคือปัญหา ด้วยการพยายามหาทางออกให้เรื่องเหล่านี้ สตาร์ทอัพจำนวนหนึ่งสามารถใช้ประโยชน์จากเทคโนโลยีบล็อกเชนและระบบจัดเก็บแบบกระจายศูนย์ ไม่เพียงแต่สร้างแนวคิด แต่ตระหนักถึงมาตรฐานและแอปพลิเคชั่นของ Web3 อีกด้วย และ CyberConnect ก็คือหนึ่งในนั้น โปรโตคอลโซเชียลกราฟแบบกระจายศูนย์, CyberConnect ขับเคลื่อน Metaverse และ Dapps ด้วยการมีปฏิสัมพันธ์ของมนุษย์และการเชื่อมต่อที่ดีขึ้น

### แล้วคุณหมายถึงอะไรหละ ที่บอก “โซเชียลกราฟ”?

ข้อมูลสำคัญจำนวนมากที่เรามอบให้โซเชียลมีเดีย Web2 แบบรวมศูนย์คือความสัมพันธ์ทางสังคมของเรา เราเชื่อมโยงถึงใครและอย่างไร ด้วยจากการเชื่อมต่อรายบุคคลเหล่านี้แล้วนั้น ยักษ์ใหญ่ด้านโซเชียลมีเดีย เช่น Facebook สามารถสร้างโซเชียลกราฟขึ้นมาได้ (การทำแผนที่การเชื่อมต่อทั่วโลก) บางอย่างเราก็ไม่อาจสามารถที่จะติดตามได้ด้วยซ้ำ ยกตัวอย่างเช่น หลานสาวของพี่สะใภ้ของแม่ของจอห์นเป็นภรรยาเพื่อนของสามีของเจน หรือหลานคนโตของลุงของโดนัลด์กำลังออกเดทกับลูกสาวของเพื่อนร่วมงานของเดซี่ ฯลฯ (*งงมากบอกเลย*) คุณคงเข้าใจแหละ ในปัจจุบันยุคของ Web2, บริษัทต่างพากันใช้จ่ายไปอย่างมากเพื่อให้ได้มาซึ่งข้อมูลดังกล่าว และได้สร้างโซเชียลกราฟที่กระจัดกระจายของตัวเอง หรือก็คือ  - สวนที่มีกำแพง (หรือก็หมายถึงองค์กรที่มีอำนาจสูงสุดในการควบคุมข้อมูลนั้นๆในพื้นที่ของตัวเอง) ซึ่งก็น่าแดกดันยิ่งนัก ที่ถือว่าเป็นทรัพสินย์ที่มีค่าสูงสุดและเป็นแบบอย่างให้กับโมเดลธุรกิจที่ขับเคลื่อนด้วยโฆษณาของพวกบริษัทเหล่านี้

### แล้วมันมีปัญหายังไงหละ?

เยอะเลยแหละ การใช้ที่ไม่ปลอดภัยและไม่มีประสิทธิภาพของข้อมูล การปิดกั้นการสร้างรายได้ของเนื้อหา อุปสรรคที่สูงในการเข้ามาของนักพัฒนา ลิสต์พวกนี้ก็ยังมีต่อไปเรื่อยๆ เราจะกล่าวถึงสิ่งสำคัญโดยเฉพาะละกัน

สำหรับผู้ใช้งานและผู้บริโภค มันมีราคาของการเปลี่ยนไปใช้แพลตฟอร์มใหม่ที่สูงอยู่เสมอ ต้องสมัครบัญชีใหม่ กดติดตามเพื่อนอีกครั้ง หัวเสียเมื่อเพื่อนบางคนไม่กดติดตามกลับอีก ลองนึกดูว่าถ้ามีการเข้าสู่ระบบแบบสากล ซึ่งสิ่งนี้มีอยู่แล้ว ต้องขอบคุณ Ethereum address และภายในที่อยู่นั้นก็เก็บการเชื่อมต่อของคุณทั้งหมด ทุกๆครั้งที่คุณเข้าสู่ระบบเข้าไปในแพลตฟอร์มใหม่ๆด้วยบัญชีนี้ คุณสามารถดูรายชื่อเพื่อนและการติดตามจากแพลตฟอร์มอื่นๆทั้งหมดของคุณได้ ข้อมูลโซเชียลกราฟกลายเป็นสินทรัพย์ส่วนบุคคลและพกพาได้ที่คุณสามารถแพ็คของละออกไปได้เลย ทำลายกำแพงระหว่างแพลตฟอร์มและชุมชน ละสิ่งที่ดีกว่านั้นคือคุณได้เป็นเจ้าของข้อมูลส่วนบุคคลนั้นจริงๆเป็นครั้งแรก ได้ตัดสินใจว่าจะเอาอะไรเข้าไปเก็บและอะไรที่ดีสำหรับการแสดงผล

อุปสรรคที่ยิ่งใหญ่กว่านั้นได้ขวางทางนักพัฒนาไว้อยู่ พื้นที่โซเชียลมีเดียในปัจจุบันนี้ไม่เพียงเป็นแต่ศูนย์รวมอำนาจที่มากกว่าภาคการเงินเท่านั้น แต่อาจมีการแข่งแข่งขันที่มากกว่าเช่นกัน  
 สำหรับแต่ละแอปพลิเคชั่นที่พยายามจะสร้างผลลัพธ์ให้คนมองเห็นในพื้นที่แออัดนี้นั้น นักพัฒนาจำเป็นที่จะต้องสร้างโซเชียลกราฟใหม่ทุกครั้ง มันใช้ทั้งเวลา เงิน ความพยายาม และ ความโชคดีนิดนึง  
 อย่างไรก็ตาม จะเกิดอะไรขึ้นถ้ามีโซเชียลกราฟที่เป็น open-sourced ที่ปราศจากเจ้าของแบบรวมศูนย์และให้ทุกคนสามารถสร้างต่อจากตรงนี้ได้หละ? แอปพลิเคชั่นใดๆที่มีประโยชน์ใช้สอยและความบันเทิงที่แข่งแกร่งสามารถเบ่งบานได้อย่างง่ายๆเลย โดยไม่ต้องเปลืองทรัพยากรส่วนใหญ่ในการสร้างสิ่งที่มีอยู่แล้วขึ้นมาใหม่

### วิธีแก้ปัญหามีลักษณะเป็นยังไงหละ

CyberConnect คือโซเชียลกราฟโปรโตคอลแบบกระจายศูนย์ที่สนับสนุนโครงสร้างพื้นฐาน Web3 และเชิญชวนแอปพลิเคชั่นต่างๆให้มาสร้างขึ้นบนโครงสร้างพื้นฐานเหล่านี้ เราได้ทำการจัดเตรียม Module โซเชียลกราฟที่ได้มาตรฐานซึ่งเป็น open-sourced และเข้ากันได้กับหลายบล็อกเชน  
 เป็นโซเชียลกราฟที่มีชุมชนเป็นเจ้าของ และด้วยข้อมูลที่พกพาไปไหนก็ได้นำความเป็นไปได้ที่ไม่มีที่สิ้นสุดให้แก่ Web3 เกม, แอปส่งข้อความ, ฟีดข่าว, Metaverse, และอื่นๆอีกมากมาย ทำลายกำแพงระหว่างชุมชนและนิยามการปฏิสัมพันธ์ของมนุษย์ขึ้นมาใหม่ เพื่อให้ได้ลิ้มรสชาติ เราได้พัฒนา [CyberChat](https://www.cyberch.at/) เพื่อที่จะแสดงให้เห็นว่ากราฟข้อมูลถูกนำไปใช้ประโยชน์ได้อย่างไรอีกด้วย
